mapper.select:
/* str413skrvServiceImpl Query01 */ BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON SET ARITHABORT ON
DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)법인코드 */ , @INOUT_DATE_FR NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고일 */ , @INOUT_DATE_TO NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고일 */ , @DIV_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)사업장 */ , @WH_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고창고 */ , @INOUT_NUM NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)출고번호 */ , @AGENT_TYPE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객분류 */ , @AREA_TYPE NVARCHAR(03) /* (선택)지역 */ , @CUSTOM_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객 */ , @CUSTOM_NAME NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)고객명 */ , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(100) /* (필수)사용자ID */ , @TodayDate NVARCHAR(08) /* 현재일자 */
SET @COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} SET @INOUT_DATE_FR = #{INOUT_DATE_FR} SET @INOUT_DATE_TO = #{INOUT_DATE_TO} SET @DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} SET @WH_CODE = N'' SET @INOUT_NUM = N'' --20191226 수정: '' -> {INOUT_NUM} SET @INOUT_NUM = #{INOUT_NUM} SET @AGENT_TYPE = N'' SET @AREA_TYPE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_CODE = #{CUSTOM_CODE} SET @CUSTOM_NAME = N'' SET @USER_ID = N''
SELECT @TodayDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(08), GETDATE(), 112)
SELECT A.COMP_CODE, A.DIV_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.INOUT_DATE, B.CUSTOM_CODE, B.CUSTOM_NAME , SUM((CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q * (-1) END)) AS ORDER_UNIT_Q , SUM((CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O * (-1) END)) AS ORDER_UNIT_O , SUM((CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT * (-1) END)) AS INOUT_TAX_AMT , SUM((CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O * (-1) END)) + SUM((CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT * (-1) END)) AS AMT_O , COUNT(A.ORDER_NUM) AS COUNT_NO
, MIN(C.ITEM_NAME) + CASE WHEN COUNT(A.ORDER_NUM) > 1 THEN ' 외 ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,COUNT(A.ORDER_NUM)-1) +' 건' ELSE '' END AS ITEM_NAME , MAX(B.FAX_NUM) AS FAX_NO , ISNULL(MAX(B.BILL_MAIL_ID),MAX(B.BILL_MAIL_ID2)) AS TO_EMAIL , (SELECT TOP 1 CODE_NAME FROM BSA100T WHERE COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND MAIN_CODE = 'M416' AND SUB_CODE != '$') AS FROM_EMAIL --20200226 , (SELECT TOP 1 SUB_CODE FROM BSA100T WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND MAIN_CODE = 'S148' AND REF_CODE1 = 'Y') AS DEAL_REPORT_TYPE , MAX(G.TRAN_NUM) AS DVRY_NUM , MAX(G.TRAN_DATE) AS DVRY_DATE , MAX(G.CAR_NO) AS CAR_NO , MAX(G.CARRIER_TYPE) AS CARRIER_TYPE , MAX(G.DRIVER) AS DRIVER , MAX(G.DRIVER_MOBILENO) AS DRIVER_MOBILENO , MAX(G.PALLET_TYPE) AS PALLET_TYPE , MAX(G.PALLET_CNT) AS PALLET_CNT , MAX(G.CREATE_LOC) AS CREATE_LOC , MAX(G.REMARK) AS REMARK FROM BTR100T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BCM100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.CUSTOM_CODE = A.SALE_CUSTOM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR200T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND C.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN SAC100T G WITH (NOLOCK) ON G.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND G.TRAN_NUM = A.INOUT_NUM WHERE A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.DIV_CODE = @DIV_CODE AND A.CREATE_LOC = '1' AND A.INOUT_DATE >= @INOUT_DATE_FR AND A.INOUT_DATE <= @INOUT_DATE_TO AND ((A.WH_CODE = @WH_CODE AND @WH_CODE != '') OR (@WH_CODE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_NUM LIKE @INOUT_NUM + '%' AND @INOUT_NUM != '') OR (@INOUT_NUM = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_CODE LIKE @CUSTOM_CODE + '%' AND @CUSTOM_CODE != '') OR (@CUSTOM_CODE = '')) AND A.INOUT_TYPE IN ('2', '3')
GROUP BY A.COMP_CODE, A.DIV_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.INOUT_DATE, B.CUSTOM_CODE, B.CUSTOM_NAME
ORDER BY A.INOUT_NUM , A.INOUT_DATE DESC
SET NOCOUNT OFF SET ARITHABORT OFF END

/*str413skrvServiceImpl clipselect */ BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM tempdb..sysobjects WHERE ID=object_id('tempdb..#STR400RKR_TMP_080913')) DROP TABLE #STR400RKR_TMP_080913
DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)법인코드 */ , @INOUT_DATE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고일 */ , @DIV_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)사업장 */ , @WH_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고창고 */ , @INOUT_NUM NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)출고번호 */ , @AGENT_TYPE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객분류 */ , @AREA_TYPE NVARCHAR(03) /* (선택)지역 */ , @CUSTOM_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객 */ , @CUSTOM_NAME NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)고객명 */ , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(100) /* (필수)사용자ID */ , @TodayDate NVARCHAR(08) /* 현재일자 */
SET @COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} SET @INOUT_DATE = N'' SET @DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} SET @WH_CODE = N'' SET @INOUT_NUM = #{INOUT_NUM} SET @AGENT_TYPE = N'' SET @AREA_TYPE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_CODE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_NAME = N'' SET @USER_ID = N''
SELECT @TodayDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(08), GETDATE(), 112)
SELECT A.COMP_CODE , A.INOUT_NUM , A.INOUT_SEQ , A.INOUT_TYPE , A.DIV_CODE , A.INOUT_DATE , A.INOUT_DATE AS PRINT_DATE /* 공급자정보 */ , E.DIV_CODE AS MY_CUSTOM_CODE , E.DIV_NAME AS MY_CUSTOM_NAME , E.REPRE_NAME AS MY_TOP_NAME , CASE ISNULL(E.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END AS MY_COMPANY_NUM , E.ZIP_CODE AS MY_ZIP_CODE , E.ADDR AS MY_ADDR , E.TELEPHON /* 공급받는자정보 - 20190905수정 배송처가 있을 경우 배송처 정보를 없으면 매출처 정보를 출력 */ , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.CUSTOM_CODE ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_SEQ END AS CUSTOM_CODE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.CUSTOM_NAME ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_NM END AS CUSTOM_NAME , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.TOP_NAME ELSE '' END AS TOP_NAME , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.TELEPHON ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_TEL END AS CUSTOM_TELEPHON , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN CASE ISNULL(B.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END ELSE '' END AS COMPANY_NUM , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.ZIP_CODE ELSE '' END AS ZIP_CODE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN RTRIM(ISNULL(B.ADDR1,'') + ISNULL(B.ADDR2,'')) ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_ADD END AS ADDR
/* NEW ADDITION */ , (SELECT SUM(B1.ORDER_UNIT_Q) FROM BTR100T B1 WHERE B1.INOUT_NUM = @INOUT_NUM) AS SUM_Q , (SELECT SUM(B1.ORDER_UNIT_O) FROM BTR100T B1 WHERE B1.INOUT_NUM = @INOUT_NUM) AS SUM_O , (SELECT SUM(B1.INOUT_TAX_AMT) FROM BTR100T B1 WHERE B1.INOUT_NUM = @INOUT_NUM) AS SUM_TAX INTO #STR400RKR_TMP_080913 FROM BTR100T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BCM100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.CUSTOM_CODE = A.SALE_CUSTOM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR200T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND C.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN BPR300T CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON CC.TYPE = '2' --20190821 '*' -> IN('*', @DIV_CODE)로 변경 AND CC.DIV_CODE IN ('*', @DIV_CODE) AND CC.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND CC.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE AND CC.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE AND CC.APLY_START_DATE = (SELECT MAX(APLY_START_DATE) FROM BPR300T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = CC.COMP_CODE AND TYPE = CC.TYPE AND DIV_CODE = CC.DIV_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = CC.ITEM_CODE AND CUSTOM_CODE = CC.CUSTOM_CODE AND APLY_START_DATE <= @TodayDate) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE , CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ) AS DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM , MAX(DD.DVRY_CUST_TEL) AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD FROM SCM100T DD WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE DD.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE GROUP BY DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE, DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM, DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD) D ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.DVRY_CUST_SEQ = A.DVRY_CUST_CD AND D.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE INNER JOIN BOR120T E WITH (NOLOCK) ON E.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND E.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE INNER JOIN BCM100T F WITH (NOLOCK) ON F.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND F.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE WHERE A.CREATE_LOC = '1' AND A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.DIV_CODE = @DIV_CODE AND ((A.INOUT_DATE = @INOUT_DATE AND @INOUT_DATE <> '') OR (@INOUT_DATE = '')) AND ((A.WH_CODE = @WH_CODE AND @WH_CODE <> '') OR (@WH_CODE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_NUM LIKE @INOUT_NUM + '%' AND @INOUT_NUM <> '') OR (@INOUT_NUM = '')) AND ((F.AGENT_TYPE = @AGENT_TYPE AND @AGENT_TYPE <> '') OR (@AGENT_TYPE = '')) AND ((ISNULL(F.AREA_TYPE,'') = @AREA_TYPE AND @AREA_TYPE <> '') OR (@AREA_TYPE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_CODE LIKE @CUSTOM_CODE + '%' AND @CUSTOM_CODE <> '') OR (@CUSTOM_CODE = '')) AND ((F.CUSTOM_NAME LIKE @CUSTOM_NAME + '%' AND @CUSTOM_NAME <> '') OR (@CUSTOM_NAME = '')) AND A.INOUT_TYPE IN ('2', '3') ORDER BY B.CUSTOM_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.INOUT_SEQ
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM #STR400RKR_TMP_080913 where inout_date > '201401' END

/* str413skrvServiceImpl clipselectsub */ BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM tempdb..sysobjects WHERE ID=object_id('tempdb..#STR400RKR_TMP_080913')) DROP TABLE #STR400RKR_TMP_080913
DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)법인코드 */ , @INOUT_DATE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고일 */ , @DIV_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)사업장 */ , @WH_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고창고 */ , @INOUT_NUM NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)출고번호 */ , @AGENT_TYPE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객분류 */ , @AREA_TYPE NVARCHAR(03) /* (선택)지역 */ , @CUSTOM_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객 */ , @CUSTOM_NAME NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)고객명 */ , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(100) /* (필수)사용자ID */ , @TodayDate NVARCHAR(08) /* 현재일자 */
SET @COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} SET @INOUT_DATE = N'' SET @DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} SET @WH_CODE = N'' SET @INOUT_NUM = #{INOUT_NUM} SET @AGENT_TYPE = N'' SET @AREA_TYPE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_CODE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_NAME = N'' SET @USER_ID = N''
SELECT @TodayDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(08), GETDATE(), 112)
SELECT A.COMP_CODE , A.INOUT_NUM , A.INOUT_SEQ , A.INOUT_TYPE , A.DIV_CODE , A.INOUT_DATE /* 공급자정보 */ , E.DIV_CODE AS MY_CUSTOM_CODE , E.DIV_NAME AS MY_CUSTOM_NAME , E.REPRE_NAME AS MY_TOP_NAME , CASE ISNULL(E.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END AS MY_COMPANY_NUM , E.ZIP_CODE AS MY_ZIP_CODE , E.ADDR AS MY_ADDR , E.TELEPHON AS MY_TELE /* 공급받는자정보 - 20190905수정 배송처가 있을 경우 배송처 정보를 없으면 매출처 정보를 출력 */ , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.CUSTOM_CODE ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_SEQ END AS CUSTOM_CODE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.CUSTOM_NAME ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_NM END AS CUSTOM_NAME , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.TOP_NAME ELSE '' END AS TOP_NAME , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.TELEPHON ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_TEL END AS CUSTOM_TELEPHON , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN CASE ISNULL(B.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END ELSE '' END AS COMPANY_NUM , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN B.ZIP_CODE ELSE '' END AS ZIP_CODE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.DVRY_CUST_CD, '') = '' THEN RTRIM(ISNULL(B.ADDR1,'') + ISNULL(B.ADDR2,'')) ELSE D.DVRY_CUST_ADD END AS ADDR /* 거래품목정보 */ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.INOUT_Q , G.TRANS_RATE , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_CODE, '') WHEN '' THEN A.ITEM_CODE ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_CODE END AS ITEM_CODE , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_NAME, '') WHEN '' THEN uniLITE.fnItemNameComp(C.COMP_CODE, @USER_ID, C.ITEM_CODE) ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_NAME END + CASE WHEN A.TRNS_RATE > 1 THEN ' ('+ LTRIM(STR(A.TRNS_RATE)) + C2.STOCK_UNIT +'/'+ A.ORDER_UNIT +')' ELSE '' END AS ITEM_NAME , C2.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME2 , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_SPEC, '') WHEN '' THEN (SELECT SPEC FROM BPR100T WHERE COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE) ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_SPEC END AS SPEC , A.ORDER_UNIT , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q * (-1) END) AS ORDER_UNIT_Q , A.ORDER_UNIT_P , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O * (-1) END) AS ORDER_UNIT_O , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT * (-1) END) AS INOUT_TAX_AMT , A.TAX_TYPE , ISNULL(A.DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) AS DISCOUNT_RATE , A.DVRY_CUST_CD , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_NM,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_NM , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_TEL,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_ADD,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_ADD , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_PRSN, ' ') AS DVRY_CUST_PRSN , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0),0) AS GUBUN , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0),0) AS l_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(6,0),0) AS N_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(6,0),0) AS MAX_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,6),0) AS SUM_Q , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,4),0) AS SUM_O , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,4),0) AS SUM_TAX , CONVERT(NUMERIC(4,0),0) AS G_REC /* 공급자용:1 / 공급받는자용:2 */ ,'1' AS G_SUPP , CASE WHEN A.LOT_NO = '*' THEN '' ELSE A.LOT_NO END AS LOT_NO , A.REMARK , C.KEEP_TEMPER , A.PACK_UNIT_Q , A.BOX_Q , A.EACH_Q , (SELECT EE.PRSN_NAME FROM BCM120T EE WHERE EE.BILL_TYPE = '2' AND EE.CUSTOM_CODE = B.CUSTOM_CODE) AS CUST_PRSN_NAME , CASE WHEN C.ITEM_ACCOUNT='10' THEN (CASE WHEN C2.STOCK_CARE_YN = 'Y' THEN uniLITE.fnGetUserdate(A.COMP_CODE, uniLITE.fnGetExpirDate4LotNo(A.COMP_CODE, A.DIV_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.LOT_NO)) ELSE '' END ) ELSE uniLITE.fnGetUserdate(A.COMP_CODE, H.MAKE_EXP_DATE) END AS EXPIR_DATE INTO #STR400RKR_TMP_080913 FROM BTR100T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BCM100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.CUSTOM_CODE = A.SALE_CUSTOM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR200T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND C.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR100T C2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON C2.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C2.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN BPR300T CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON CC.TYPE = '2' --20190820 '*' -> IN('*', @DIV_CODE)로 변경 AND CC.DIV_CODE IN ('*', @DIV_CODE) AND CC.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND CC.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE AND CC.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE AND CC.APLY_START_DATE = (SELECT MAX(APLY_START_DATE) FROM BPR300T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = CC.COMP_CODE AND TYPE = CC.TYPE AND DIV_CODE = CC.DIV_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = CC.ITEM_CODE AND CUSTOM_CODE = CC.CUSTOM_CODE AND APLY_START_DATE <= @TodayDate) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE , CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ) AS DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM , MAX(DD.DVRY_CUST_TEL) AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD , DD.DVRY_CUST_PRSN FROM SCM100T DD WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE DD.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE GROUP BY DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE, DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM, DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD, DD.DVRY_CUST_PRSN) D ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.DVRY_CUST_SEQ = A.DVRY_CUST_CD AND D.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE INNER JOIN BOR120T E WITH (NOLOCK) ON E.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND E.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE INNER JOIN BCM100T F WITH (NOLOCK) ON F.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND F.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE LEFT JOIN SOF110T G WITH (NOLOCK) ON G.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND G.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND G.SER_NO = A.ORDER_SEQ AND G.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ITEM_EXPIR_DATE_V H ON H.COMP_CODE=A.COMP_CODE AND H.DIV_CODE=A.DIV_CODE AND H.ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE AND H.LOT_NO=A.LOT_NO WHERE A.CREATE_LOC = '1' AND A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.DIV_CODE = @DIV_CODE AND ((A.INOUT_DATE = @INOUT_DATE AND @INOUT_DATE <> '') OR (@INOUT_DATE = '')) AND ((A.WH_CODE = @WH_CODE AND @WH_CODE <> '') OR (@WH_CODE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_NUM LIKE @INOUT_NUM + '%' AND @INOUT_NUM <> '') OR (@INOUT_NUM = '')) AND ((F.AGENT_TYPE = @AGENT_TYPE AND @AGENT_TYPE <> '') OR (@AGENT_TYPE = '')) AND ((ISNULL(F.AREA_TYPE,'') = @AREA_TYPE AND @AREA_TYPE <> '') OR (@AREA_TYPE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_CODE LIKE @CUSTOM_CODE + '%' AND @CUSTOM_CODE <> '') OR (@CUSTOM_CODE = '')) AND ((F.CUSTOM_NAME LIKE @CUSTOM_NAME + '%' AND @CUSTOM_NAME <> '') OR (@CUSTOM_NAME = '')) AND A.INOUT_TYPE IN ('2', '3') ORDER BY B.CUSTOM_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.REMARK, A.INOUT_SEQ /* 비고내용기준으로 정렬 위해 추가 */
SELECT * FROM #STR400RKR_TMP_080913 where inout_date > '201401' END
mapper.update:
INSERT INTO FC_MSG_TRAN ( TR_BATCHID , TR_SERIALNO , TR_SENDDATE , TR_NAME ,TR_PHONE , TR_SENDSTAT ) SELECT MAX(TR_BATCHID) , 1 , GETDATE() , #{SEND_TO} ,REPLACE(#{FAX_NO},'-','') , '0' FROM FC_META_TRAN
DECLARE @Cnt INT
SELECT @Cnt = ISNULL(MAX(TR_BATCHID),0) FROM FC_META_TRAN
UPDATE FC_META_TRAN SET TR_SENDSTAT = 0 WHERE TR_BATCHID = @Cnt
mapper.select:
/* str413skrvServiceImpl clipselect_sh_sub */ BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM tempdb..sysobjects WHERE ID=object_id('tempdb..#STR400RKR_TMP_080913')) DROP TABLE #STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_main
DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)법인코드 */ , @INOUT_DATE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고일 */ , @DIV_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)사업장 */ , @WH_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고창고 */ , @INOUT_NUM NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)출고번호 */ , @AGENT_TYPE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객분류 */ , @AREA_TYPE NVARCHAR(03) /* (선택)지역 */ , @CUSTOM_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객 */ , @CUSTOM_NAME NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)고객명 */ , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(100) /* (필수)사용자ID */ , @TodayDate NVARCHAR(08) /* 현재일자 */
SET @COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} SET @INOUT_DATE = N'' SET @DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} SET @WH_CODE = N'' SET @INOUT_NUM = #{INOUT_NUM} SET @AGENT_TYPE = N'' SET @AREA_TYPE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_CODE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_NAME = N'' SET @USER_ID = N''
SELECT @TodayDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(08), GETDATE(), 112)
SELECT A.COMP_CODE , A.INOUT_NUM , A.INOUT_SEQ , A.INOUT_TYPE , A.DIV_CODE , A.INOUT_DATE /* 공급자정보 */ , E.DIV_CODE AS MY_CUSTOM_CODE , E.DIV_NAME AS MY_CUSTOM_NAME , E.REPRE_NAME AS MY_TOP_NAME , CASE ISNULL(E.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END AS MY_COMPANY_NUM , E.ZIP_CODE AS MY_ZIP_CODE , E.ADDR AS MY_ADDR , E.TELEPHON AS MY_TELE , E.FAX_NUM AS MY_FAX_NUM , E.COMP_TYPE AS MY_COMP_TYPE , E.COMP_CLASS AS MY_COMP_CLASS , B.CUSTOM_CODE , B.CUSTOM_NAME , B.TOP_NAME , B.TELEPHON AS CUSTOM_TELEPHON , CASE ISNULL(B.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END AS COMPANY_NUM , B.ZIP_CODE , RTRIM(ISNULL(B.ADDR1,'') + ISNULL(B.ADDR2,'')) AS ADDR , B.FAX_NUM , B.COMP_TYPE , B.COMP_CLASS /* 거래품목정보 */ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.INOUT_Q , G.TRANS_RATE , G.ORDER_Q , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_CODE, '') WHEN '' THEN A.ITEM_CODE ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_CODE END AS ITEM_CODE , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_NAME, '') WHEN '' THEN REPLACE(uniLITE.fnItemNameComp(C.COMP_CODE, @USER_ID, C.ITEM_CODE), '(' + Z.CODE_NAME + ')', '-') ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_NAME END AS ITEM_NAME , C2.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME2 , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_SPEC, '') WHEN '' THEN (SELECT SPEC FROM BPR100T WHERE COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE) ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_SPEC END AS SPEC , A.ORDER_UNIT , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q * (-1) END) AS ORDER_UNIT_Q , A.ORDER_UNIT_P , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O * (-1) END) AS ORDER_UNIT_O , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT * (-1) END) AS INOUT_TAX_AMT , A.TAX_TYPE , ISNULL(A.DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) AS DISCOUNT_RATE , A.DVRY_CUST_CD , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_NM,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_NM , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_TEL,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_ADD,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_ADD , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_PRSN, ' ') AS DVRY_CUST_PRSN , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0),0) AS GUBUN , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0),0) AS l_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(6,0),0) AS N_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(6,0),0) AS MAX_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,6),0) AS SUM_Q , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,4),0) AS SUM_O , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,4),0) AS SUM_TAX , CONVERT(NUMERIC(4,0),0) AS G_REC /* 공급자용:1 / 공급받는자용:2 */ ,'1' AS G_SUPP , CASE WHEN A.LOT_NO = '*' THEN '' ELSE A.LOT_NO END AS LOT_NO , A.REMARK , C.KEEP_TEMPER , A.PACK_UNIT_Q , A.BOX_Q , A.EACH_Q , A.LOSS_Q , (SELECT EE.PRSN_NAME FROM BCM120T EE WHERE EE.BILL_TYPE = '2' AND EE.CUSTOM_CODE = B.CUSTOM_CODE) AS CUST_PRSN_NAME , CASE WHEN C.ITEM_ACCOUNT='10' THEN (CASE WHEN C2.STOCK_CARE_YN = 'Y' THEN uniLITE.fnGetUserdate(A.COMP_CODE, uniLITE.fnGetExpirDate4LotNo(A.COMP_CODE, A.DIV_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.LOT_NO)) ELSE '' END ) ELSE uniLITE.fnGetUserdate(A.COMP_CODE, H.MAKE_EXP_DATE) END AS EXPIR_DATE INTO #STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_main FROM BTR100T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BCM100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.CUSTOM_CODE = A.SALE_CUSTOM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR200T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND C.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR100T C2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON C2.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C2.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN BPR300T CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON CC.TYPE = '2' --20190820 '*' -> IN('*', @DIV_CODE)로 변경 AND CC.DIV_CODE IN ('*', @DIV_CODE) AND CC.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND CC.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE AND CC.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE AND CC.APLY_START_DATE = (SELECT MAX(APLY_START_DATE) FROM BPR300T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = CC.COMP_CODE AND TYPE = CC.TYPE AND DIV_CODE = CC.DIV_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = CC.ITEM_CODE AND CUSTOM_CODE = CC.CUSTOM_CODE AND APLY_START_DATE <= @TodayDate) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE , CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ) AS DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM , MAX(DD.DVRY_CUST_TEL) AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD , DD.DVRY_CUST_PRSN , DD.DVRY_CUST_FAX FROM SCM100T DD WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE DD.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE GROUP BY DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE , DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM, DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD, DD.DVRY_CUST_PRSN , DD.DVRY_CUST_FAX) D ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.DVRY_CUST_SEQ = A.DVRY_CUST_CD AND D.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE INNER JOIN BOR120T E WITH (NOLOCK) ON E.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND E.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE INNER JOIN BCM100T F WITH (NOLOCK) ON F.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND F.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE LEFT JOIN SOF110T G WITH (NOLOCK) ON G.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND G.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND G.SER_NO = A.ORDER_SEQ AND G.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN BSA100T Z WITH (NOLOCK) ON Z.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND Z.MAIN_CODE = 'Z040' AND Z.SUB_CODE = SUBSTRING(A.ITEM_CODE, 11, 1) LEFT JOIN ITEM_EXPIR_DATE_V H ON H.COMP_CODE=A.COMP_CODE AND H.DIV_CODE=A.DIV_CODE AND H.ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE AND H.LOT_NO=A.LOT_NO WHERE A.CREATE_LOC = '1' AND A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.DIV_CODE = @DIV_CODE AND ((A.INOUT_DATE = @INOUT_DATE AND @INOUT_DATE != '') OR (@INOUT_DATE = '')) AND ((A.WH_CODE = @WH_CODE AND @WH_CODE != '') OR (@WH_CODE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_NUM LIKE @INOUT_NUM + '%' AND @INOUT_NUM != '') OR (@INOUT_NUM = '')) AND ((F.AGENT_TYPE = @AGENT_TYPE AND @AGENT_TYPE != '') OR (@AGENT_TYPE = '')) AND ((ISNULL(F.AREA_TYPE,'') = @AREA_TYPE AND @AREA_TYPE != '') OR (@AREA_TYPE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_CODE LIKE @CUSTOM_CODE + '%' AND @CUSTOM_CODE != '') OR (@CUSTOM_CODE = '')) AND ((F.CUSTOM_NAME LIKE @CUSTOM_NAME + '%' AND @CUSTOM_NAME != '') OR (@CUSTOM_NAME = '')) AND A.INOUT_TYPE IN ('2', '3') ORDER BY B.CUSTOM_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.REMARK, A.INOUT_SEQ /* 비고내용기준으로 정렬 위해 추가 */
SELECT * FROM #STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_main WHERE INOUT_DATE > '201401' END

/* str413skrvServiceImpl clipselect_sh_sub */ BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM tempdb..sysobjects WHERE ID=object_id('tempdb..#STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_sub')) DROP TABLE #STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_sub
DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)법인코드 */ , @INOUT_DATE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고일 */ , @DIV_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (필수)사업장 */ , @WH_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)출고창고 */ , @INOUT_NUM NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)출고번호 */ , @AGENT_TYPE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객분류 */ , @AREA_TYPE NVARCHAR(03) /* (선택)지역 */ , @CUSTOM_CODE NVARCHAR(08) /* (선택)고객 */ , @CUSTOM_NAME NVARCHAR(20) /* (선택)고객명 */ , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(100) /* (필수)사용자ID */ , @TodayDate NVARCHAR(08) /* 현재일자 */
SET @COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} SET @INOUT_DATE = N'' SET @DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} SET @WH_CODE = N'' SET @INOUT_NUM = #{INOUT_NUM} SET @AGENT_TYPE = N'' SET @AREA_TYPE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_CODE = N'' SET @CUSTOM_NAME = N'' SET @USER_ID = N''
SELECT @TodayDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(08), GETDATE(), 112)
SELECT A.COMP_CODE , A.INOUT_NUM , A.INOUT_SEQ , A.INOUT_TYPE , A.DIV_CODE , A.INOUT_DATE /* 공급자정보 */ , E.DIV_CODE AS MY_CUSTOM_CODE , E.DIV_NAME AS MY_CUSTOM_NAME , E.REPRE_NAME AS MY_TOP_NAME , CASE ISNULL(E.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(E.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END AS MY_COMPANY_NUM , E.ZIP_CODE AS MY_ZIP_CODE , E.ADDR AS MY_ADDR , E.TELEPHON AS MY_TELE , E.FAX_NUM AS MY_FAX_NUM , E.COMP_TYPE AS MY_COMP_TYPE , E.COMP_CLASS AS MY_COMP_CLASS , B.CUSTOM_CODE , B.CUSTOM_NAME , B.TOP_NAME , B.TELEPHON AS CUSTOM_TELEPHON , CASE ISNULL(B.COMPANY_NUM,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(B.COMPANY_NUM,6,5) END AS COMPANY_NUM , B.ZIP_CODE , RTRIM(ISNULL(B.ADDR1,'') + ISNULL(B.ADDR2,'')) AS ADDR , B.FAX_NUM , B.COMP_TYPE , B.COMP_CLASS /* 거래품목정보 */ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.INOUT_Q , G.TRANS_RATE , G.ORDER_Q , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_CODE, '') WHEN '' THEN A.ITEM_CODE ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_CODE END AS ITEM_CODE , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_NAME, '') WHEN '' THEN REPLACE(uniLITE.fnItemNameComp(C.COMP_CODE, @USER_ID, C.ITEM_CODE), '(' + Z.CODE_NAME + ')', '-') ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_NAME END AS ITEM_NAME , C2.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME2 , CASE ISNULL(CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_SPEC, '') WHEN '' THEN (SELECT SPEC FROM BPR100T WHERE COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE) ELSE CC.CUSTOM_ITEM_SPEC END AS SPEC , A.ORDER_UNIT , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_Q * (-1) END) AS ORDER_UNIT_Q , A.ORDER_UNIT_P , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.ORDER_UNIT_O * (-1) END) AS ORDER_UNIT_O , (CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '2' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = '3' THEN A.INOUT_TAX_AMT * (-1) END) AS INOUT_TAX_AMT , A.TAX_TYPE , ISNULL(A.DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) AS DISCOUNT_RATE , A.DVRY_CUST_CD , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_NM,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_NM , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_TEL,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_ADD,' ') AS DVRY_CUST_ADD , ISNULL(D.DVRY_CUST_PRSN, ' ') AS DVRY_CUST_PRSN , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0),0) AS GUBUN , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0),0) AS l_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(6,0),0) AS N_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(6,0),0) AS MAX_PAGE , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,6),0) AS SUM_Q , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,4),0) AS SUM_O , CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,4),0) AS SUM_TAX , CONVERT(NUMERIC(4,0),0) AS G_REC /* 공급자용:1 / 공급받는자용:2 */ ,'1' AS G_SUPP , CASE WHEN A.LOT_NO = '*' THEN '' ELSE A.LOT_NO END AS LOT_NO , A.REMARK , C.KEEP_TEMPER , A.PACK_UNIT_Q , A.BOX_Q , A.EACH_Q , A.LOSS_Q , (SELECT EE.PRSN_NAME FROM BCM120T EE WHERE EE.BILL_TYPE = '2' AND EE.CUSTOM_CODE = B.CUSTOM_CODE) AS CUST_PRSN_NAME , CASE WHEN C.ITEM_ACCOUNT='10' THEN (CASE WHEN C2.STOCK_CARE_YN = 'Y' THEN uniLITE.fnGetUserdate(A.COMP_CODE, uniLITE.fnGetExpirDate4LotNo(A.COMP_CODE, A.DIV_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.LOT_NO)) ELSE '' END ) ELSE uniLITE.fnGetUserdate(A.COMP_CODE, H.MAKE_EXP_DATE) END AS EXPIR_DATE INTO #STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_sub FROM BTR100T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BCM100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.CUSTOM_CODE = A.SALE_CUSTOM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR200T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND C.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN BPR100T C2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON C2.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C2.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN BPR300T CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON CC.TYPE = '2' --20190820 '*' -> IN('*', @DIV_CODE)로 변경 AND CC.DIV_CODE IN ('*', @DIV_CODE) AND CC.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND CC.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE AND CC.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE AND CC.APLY_START_DATE = (SELECT MAX(APLY_START_DATE) FROM BPR300T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = CC.COMP_CODE AND TYPE = CC.TYPE AND DIV_CODE = CC.DIV_CODE AND ITEM_CODE = CC.ITEM_CODE AND CUSTOM_CODE = CC.CUSTOM_CODE AND APLY_START_DATE <= @TodayDate) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE , CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ) AS DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM , MAX(DD.DVRY_CUST_TEL) AS DVRY_CUST_TEL , DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD , DD.DVRY_CUST_PRSN , DD.DVRY_CUST_FAX FROM SCM100T DD WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE DD.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE GROUP BY DD.COMP_CODE , DD.CUSTOM_CODE , DD.DVRY_CUST_SEQ , DD.DVRY_CUST_NM, DD.DVRY_CUST_ADD, DD.DVRY_CUST_PRSN , DD.DVRY_CUST_FAX) D ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.DVRY_CUST_SEQ = A.DVRY_CUST_CD AND D.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE INNER JOIN BOR120T E WITH (NOLOCK) ON E.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND E.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE INNER JOIN BCM100T F WITH (NOLOCK) ON F.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND F.CUSTOM_CODE = A.INOUT_CODE LEFT JOIN SOF110T G WITH (NOLOCK) ON G.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND G.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND G.SER_NO = A.ORDER_SEQ AND G.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN BSA100T Z WITH (NOLOCK) ON Z.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND Z.MAIN_CODE = 'Z040' AND Z.SUB_CODE = SUBSTRING(A.ITEM_CODE, 11, 1) LEFT JOIN ITEM_EXPIR_DATE_V H ON H.COMP_CODE=A.COMP_CODE AND H.DIV_CODE=A.DIV_CODE AND H.ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE AND H.LOT_NO=A.LOT_NO WHERE A.CREATE_LOC = '1' AND A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.DIV_CODE = @DIV_CODE AND ((A.INOUT_DATE = @INOUT_DATE AND @INOUT_DATE != '') OR (@INOUT_DATE = '')) AND ((A.WH_CODE = @WH_CODE AND @WH_CODE != '') OR (@WH_CODE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_NUM LIKE @INOUT_NUM + '%' AND @INOUT_NUM != '') OR (@INOUT_NUM = '')) AND ((F.AGENT_TYPE = @AGENT_TYPE AND @AGENT_TYPE != '') OR (@AGENT_TYPE = '')) AND ((ISNULL(F.AREA_TYPE,'') = @AREA_TYPE AND @AREA_TYPE != '') OR (@AREA_TYPE = '')) AND ((A.INOUT_CODE LIKE @CUSTOM_CODE + '%' AND @CUSTOM_CODE != '') OR (@CUSTOM_CODE = '')) AND ((F.CUSTOM_NAME LIKE @CUSTOM_NAME + '%' AND @CUSTOM_NAME != '') OR (@CUSTOM_NAME = '')) AND A.INOUT_TYPE IN ('2', '3') ORDER BY B.CUSTOM_CODE, A.INOUT_NUM, A.REMARK, A.INOUT_SEQ /* 비고내용기준으로 정렬 위해 추가 */
SELECT * FROM #STR400RKR_TMP_clipselect_sh_sub WHERE INOUT_DATE > '201401' END
